title: database is locked error
body:
### expected behaviour
my admin changed the password of my account, i tried logging in directly after he told me the new password

### actual behaviour
an exception occurred while executing 'insert into oc_preferences (userid, appid, configkey, configvalue) values (?, ?, ?, ?)' with params ["username", "files", "cache_version", 5]: sqlstate[hy000]: general error: 5 database is locked


### steps to reproduce
1. change user password
2. try to login directly with that account
3. error on screen still logged in

### server configuration
operating system:
centos 6.5

web server: 
apache
database:
mysql

owncloud version: (see owncloud admin page)
6.0.0a (stable) 

updated from an older owncloud or fresh install:
fresh install

are you using external storage, if yes which one:
no

### client configuration
browser:
firefox 22.0
operating system:
fedora 17
